plot: Melvin is going to kill a man. He never thought he would, if not because those 3000 Euros will be the passport that will bring Mary to him... Perhaps, Spain is not so different from El Salvador.
title: La ventaja del Sicario
plot_es: Melvin is going to kill a man. He never thought he would, if not because those 3000 Euros will be the passport that will bring Mary to him... Perhaps, Spain is not so different from El Salvador.
plot_en: Melvin is going to kill a man. He never thought he would, if not because those 3000 Euros will be the passport that will bring Mary to him... Perhaps, Spain is not so different from El Salvador.
